Desc.eng: Ah new customer in these bleak times! A sight for sore eyes, really.
So, you are back, huh? If you still need the explosive device, the price is the same. 1200 gold.
I don’t have the necessary funds at the moment. I’ll be back.
I don’t need your overpriced gadgets.
Come on. You deal in forbidden goods. Business must be thriving. Take me, for example: I need an explosive device.
I might just have what you need. I won’t ask why you want it and you pay me 1200 gold.
I don’t have the necessary funds at the moment. I’ll be back.
I don’t need your overpriced gadgets.
